author: bsunanda
body:
Added 2 new functions to HcalTopology class:
bool  withSpecialRBXHBHE() const; True if there are special RBX in the setup for HB/HE
HcalDetId mergedDepthDetId(HcalDetId& id) const; returns the DetId after merging several depths into a new one.
title: bsunanda:Run2-hcx99 Interface change in view of handling special RBX
